title: New residential building (other than gate lodges, quarters for limited essential operational staff a
clause_text: New residential building (other than gate lodges, quarters for limited essential operational staff and the like), roads and drains in railway colonies, hospitals, clubs, institutes and schools in case of railways;
section: Constructions Not Covered under the Operational Constructions
